title: [Caligos Isle, Upper Berm]
description: Fine grey sand has mounded to create a berm providing some refuge from the waves.  A nice, dry place to sit and enjoy a small bonfire and the diggers as they toil, though the sand is cool at night, requiring a blanket for those who wish to rest for long.

Fine grey sand has mounded to create a berm providing some refuge from the waves.  A nice, dry place to sit and enjoy a small bonfire or watch the diggers as they toil, though the sand is cool at night, requiring a blanket for those who wish to rest for long.
